subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: As the Rangers prepared to play Game 7 of their second-round playoff series against the Capitals, set for Wednesday night, Henrik Lundqvist was acting as if it were any other game.
snippet: As the Rangers prepared to play Game 7 of their second-round playoff series against the Capitals, set for Wednesday night, Henrik Lundqvist was acting as if it were any other game.
